title: Nicki Minaj “Sorry” for Sampling Music Without Permission?
description:
Nicki Minaj is one of the best rappers of all time, known for her creativity and innovation. But, does she respect other artist’s rights? After sampling music from one of Tracy Chapman’s songs without permission, Tracy accuses her of copyright infringement and for leaking the song against her wishes.  Tune in as we break it all down!

LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
